page.title: 02Housing in Lytham St. Annes
page.content: The streets have many different styles of buildings. There are many interesting patterns of tile work on the Victorian houses.Tall chimneys which are heavily decorated at the top.Manyof these older houses have now been turned into flats and apartments,especially used in the holiday season. Many of the streets are tree lined,the horse_chestnut and sycamore are two popular types. Many of the modern houses on the sea front have been built with low flat roofs so they can stand up to the sands and strong winds which very often blow. The sand is checked regularly to stop it getting onto the roads and buildings along the streets bordering the coast.
